data.title: MHz Choice
data.meta_description: Browse our collection of series from Italy.
data.text:
DOCUMENTARY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

Join popular scientist Alberto Angela on a night tour of the city that gave birth to the Renaissance... and hear Andrea Bocelli sing in the Cathedral of Florence.

MYSTERY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

Marco Buratti aka The Alligator is an ex-con turned private eye in this modern Italian noir based on the novels by Massimo Carlotto.

DRAMA | ITALY | ENGLISH | TV-14

Inspired by sci-fi classics such as The Twilight Zone, V and The X-Files, directors Marco and Antonio Manetti keep you on the edge of your seat with The Arrival of Wang. An Italian cult classic, it tells the story of an interpreter taken to a secret location by a m...

DOCUMENTARY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-PG

A fascinating historical travelogue tracing the footsteps of the Cathars and the Bogomils, two spiritual and social movements that questioned the authority and power of the Church in the Middle Ages.

DRAMA | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

Luca Zingaretti (Detective Montalbano) stars as Judge Paolo Borsellino, who on May 23, 1992 waited for a personal visit from his friend, Judge Giovani Falcone. He never made it. Traveling from the airport, Falcone, his wife and his bodyguards...

DRAMA | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

In this emotional Italian period drama, a young woman from Calabria is forced into an arranged marriage to save her family from poverty.

This series expires on June 30, 2024

MYSTERY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-PG

Investigative journalist Bruno Palmieri throws caution to the wind and decides to overlook his fragile health and live with gusto. He's ready to tackle new stories, eat good food again and reconnect wit...

DRAMA - CRIME | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

Captain Maria Guerra (Vanessa Incontrada) returns to her hometown of Puglia on the Adriatic Coast - a compassionate cop in a seaside world of trouble.

DRAMA | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

The true story of how Cesare Mori ("The Iron Prefect") cleaned up the Sicilian Mafia is a little-known chapter of Italian history and spans the years from World War I to the rise of Fascism. In one night alone, he and his men arrested 300 de...

DRAMA - CRIME | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

Against the backdrop of Italyâ€™s political upheaval, Fascism and chaos during the ten-year period between 1938 and 1948, Detective De Luca does the one thing he knows how to do best: be a cop. He investigates and solves crimes in the ...

MYSTERY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

All 37 episodes! Murder, betrayal, office politics, temptation... it's all in a day's work for Detective Salvo Montalbano. Filmed in the ancient, sun-washed Sicilian city of Ragusa Ibla, the series is based on the international best-selling...

MYSTERY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-PG

More seasons coming soon! Terence Hill stars as Don Matteo, a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to read people and solve crimes.

DRAMA | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-PG

In postwar Italy, entrepreneur Enrico Piaggio risks everything on his latest invention, soon to be the most famous scooter in the world - the Vespa!

DOCUMENTARY | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-G

A Sicilian farmer in a small village adapts to changing crops and climates, maintaining the traditions of his ancestors.

DRAMA - CRIME | ITALY | ITALIAN WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES | TV-14

In the real-life story of one of Sicily's bravest sons, Giovanni Falcone tells the story of the war waged by an Italian judge against the Mafia during the 1980s and '90s. Methodically, Falcone followed the money and exposed the vast ...
